item.title: Problem with leaves in SE16 4 JD, 22nd November
item.description:
Yesterday your leaf cleaners did an excellent job of clearing leaves, except they didn’t touch the leaves in the square in Elephant Lane, in front of houses 33 - 43. For some years ownership of this piece of land was disputed, but since double yellow lines were put in, we assumed you were taking responsibility for it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 11-23, Elephant Lane, Bermondsey, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Shop waste out of timebands, 22nd November
item.description:
The shop puts it's waste out in front of neighbouring houses at 4pm every day The time band for green lanes is 8-9pm so the rubbish is out (in front of houses not the shop) for 5/6 hours When challenged they said the council gave them permission to do so

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Green Lanes, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
